defects_found.description: Generated complex authentication system not specified in design requirements
defects_found.evidence: Code includes JWT authentication, user models, task management, and database components but design specification only requires /hello and /health endpoints

defects_found.description: Task management functionality not present in design specification
defects_found.evidence: Generated task CRUD operations, task models, and task API endpoints that are not specified in the design requirements

defects_found.description: Database models and SQLAlchemy integration not specified in design
defects_found.evidence: Generated User and Task models with database relationships but design specification requires no database or persistent storage
